title: Places I have lived
name: Places I have lived
description:
A Map by Drummerbrg

These are the places I have lived

properties.name: Burbank St. Apartment
properties.description: Posted by DrummerbrgBurbank St. ApartmentBurbank St. apartment was fawesome. Just John and I, close to school and everything else.

properties.name: Corinth Apartment
properties.description: Posted by Drummerbrg3720 Corinth Ave. Los Angeles, CA 90066Where Sara and I call home now. Love it here.

properties.name: Kings Road
properties.description: Posted by DrummerbrgSanta Monica Blvd. Los Angeles, CAAlmost forgot about this place. It was my dad\'s office and I took over one of the rooms for a year or two. It was nice, just not my own.

properties.name: Manning Ave.
properties.description: Posted by Drummerbrg2334 Manning Ave. Los Angeles, CA 90064Spent most of my life here

properties.name: Mass Ave. Dorm
properties.description: Posted by DrummerbrgMassachusetts Ave. Boston, MABerklee Main Campus - The Dorm...lived here for the first year of college. Roomed with John and that Red-headed Jesus freak with a pacemaker for the first half of the year. Then John and I moved in with "Wilson" who turned out to be a fucking nut. There were lots of mice.

properties.name: Peterborough St. Apartment in Boston
properties.description: Posted by DrummerbrgBoston, MAThis was my first apartment in Boston. Lived with John and Peter.

properties.name: Rogers Park
properties.description: Posted by DrummerbrgÂ West Pratt Ave. Chicago, ILThis is where I spent the first 4 years of my life...I think. Can\'t really remember the address.

properties.name: The Dorm
properties.description: Posted by Drummerbrg10020 Tabor St. Los Angeles, CATabor Apartment "The Dorm" was good for what it was. 1 bedroom, 1 bath, good location. Got fucking hot in the summer...almost cost me my marriage. Lived there for almost 6 years. That was about 4 years too long.

properties.name: The Mosa
properties.description: Posted by DrummerbrgMelrose Ave. Los Angeles, CAFirst apartment in Los Angeles with Derek and Matt. Great location...even better rent. I think we paid ,300 for a 3 bedroom 1 1/2 bath in 1996.
